title: React for Beginners
description: Learn React from scratch with hands-on examples.
detailedDescription: This beginner-friendly course introduces you to React fundamentals like components, JSX, props, and state. You'll build small projects and gain real-world experience creating interactive UIs.

modulesVideos.title: Introduction to React
modulesVideos.description: Overview of what React is and why it matters.

modulesVideos.title: JSX and Components
modulesVideos.description: Learn JSX syntax and functional components.

modulesVideos.title: Props and State
modulesVideos.description: Understand passing data with props and managing local state.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into modern JavaScript concepts and ES6+ features.
detailedDescription: Go beyond the basics and master closures, async/await, the event loop, and advanced object manipulation. This course is ideal for developers looking to sharpen their JS skills.

modulesVideos.title: Scopes and Closures
modulesVideos.description: Dive deep into scope chains and closures in JavaScript.

title: Web Design Essentials
description: Master HTML, CSS, and responsive design.
detailedDescription: This course walks you through the foundations of HTML and CSS. Learn to design visually appealing and responsive websites that look great on all devices.

modulesVideos.title: HTML Basics
modulesVideos.description: Learn the foundation of HTML for creating structure.

modulesVideos.title: CSS Fundamentals
modulesVideos.description: Understand how to style elements with CSS.

title: Node.js & Express
description: Backend development with Node.js and Express framework.
detailedDescription: Learn to build scalable backend APIs using Node.js and Express. This course covers routing, middleware, database connections, and REST API development.

modulesVideos.title: Intro to Node.js
modulesVideos.description: Understand Node.js runtime and use cases.

modulesVideos.title: Express Setup
modulesVideos.description: Setup and configure Express with Node.js.

title: Full Stack Development
description: Build complete web applications using MERN stack.
detailedDescription: Combine frontend and backend knowledge to build full stack web apps using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. You'll complete a real-world capstone project by the end.

modulesVideos.title: MERN Stack Overview
modulesVideos.description: What is the MERN stack and how it works.

modulesVideos.title: Connecting MongoDB
modulesVideos.description: Setup and connect your Node app with MongoDB.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn design principles and tools to create user-friendly interfaces.
detailedDescription: Understand the core principles of design, wireframing, and prototyping. This course also covers popular design tools like Figma and Adobe XD.

modulesVideos.title: Intro to UI/UX
modulesVideos.description: Introduction to design thinking and user-centric design.

modulesVideos.title: Figma Basics
modulesVideos.description: Learn the basics of designing in Figma.
